name: Blush Bouquet
description: A soft, romantic mix of blush roses, eucalyptus, and seasonal blooms—perfect for any occasion.

name: Garden Gathering
description: Abundant garden-style arrangement with lush greens and a variety of textures and colors.

name: Modern Minimal
description: Clean lines and a curated selection of stems for a contemporary look.

name: Sunset Vibes
description: Warm tones of coral, peach, and amber for a cozy, inviting feel.

name: Fresh Greens
description: Eucalyptus, ferns, and foliage-focused arrangement—elegant and long-lasting.

name: Celebration
description: Bold and joyful mix for birthdays, anniversaries, or any reason to celebrate.
